text: Yeah, because there is such a big problem with white men sexually harassing black women. I see it all the time.

I just think it's a strange advert. I think the majority of men know that misogyny, rape and racist is wrong. We don't need to be preached to on some bizarre advert about selling razors.

You think men who are the above are suddenly going to watch the advert and go "fuck, I best change my ways", of course not. 
The message is a good one. The way it's been presented on this advert is just a weird imaginary world that demonizes all men.

Get the marketing folk to start pushing adverts about those things and I'm sure people will. (The John Lewis and Iceland ones spring to mind!)
